story:
Mission Statement

To create distinguished, exciting and innovative knit products for everyone.

Scott Ian McFarland Knitwear Story

Scott Ian McFarland Knitwear is a knitwear manufacturing company that I opened a little over a year ago. As a fashion designer with my own line, I saw a huge need for a knitwear manufacturing company that would work with starting designers with no minimum order. That is how Scott Ian McFarland Knitwear came to be. We will work with anyone that wants to make a knit product from a blanket to a jacket and everything in between.

After being in business for over a year, we have come to a point where need to expand and purchase more equipment to help meet the needs of our customers. 

We are growing and we need help bringing dreams from paper to reality.  By expanding we will help our local community by being able to employ more people. We will help communities all over the country by creating knit products from designers in those communities. 


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for 15k. This money will go to several things. First part will be used to secure a second machine and double our capacity to create great knitwear for you. This money will help us hire and train more people to make our great knits.

15k

11k down payment on second machine

4k first months pay for employees while they are training to create great knits!

With your contribution you will help us grow. You will be able to select some great perks like sweaters, blankets, or even design your own custom knit blanket. All perks are limited addition as well so you are not only getting a great knit product made in NC but also a unique one.

The great thing with Indiegogo is it is not an all or nothing funding site. What we raise together will fund us and allow us to provide you the great products in the perks.

The Impact

The impact will be felt instantly. Once the Indiegogo campaign ends we will begin our expansion. This will include the purchase of more equipment and the hiring of more help. This will make a real difference here in the Conover/Hickory North Carolina area by providing good jobs. It may help your local community as well. Many of the designers that we work with are all over the county. For example one of our clients Matter.com, that we make great knit blankets for, is based in New Orleans. Some of the proceeds of every blanket purchased go to the Sandy relief fund. See lots of impacts from a small knit factory in Conover North Carolina: with one-product three communities are impacted. 



Risks & Challenges

With any small business there are risks and challenges. Over the last year and half we have weathered a few. Such as lack of work, machine failures and lack of trained help. And let's not forget that manufacturing any products in the USA can be more expensive which turns some business away. 

As someone that has both a design and manufacturing background and been surviving for over year in business I am confident that all the challenges we have experienced are being overcome as we grow and get better at what we do.

I see these as opportunities. We are getting more work and getting our name out to more people. This campaign will help with that. You can also help by spreading the word about what we are up to.  I feel passionately about having the products I chose to use and buy being made here in the USA. I always find it really cool to meet people that had a hand in creating what we use every day. By having products  made in the USA the carbon footprint is smaller since the product has less distance to travel before it is in your hands.  Producing things here also helps the local community that we call home by stimulating the local economy.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please pass our information on to everyone you know. They may need a great sweater, scarf or blanket.  Let everyone know about us. There is a lot of talk these days about American manufacturing coming back and we are part of that. We are making great things here everyday and would love for more people to enjoy them.


Pictures of the fun things we make that you can get!

The McFarland is a fun and wearable line for both stylish men and women. Our size range is small to x-large (all the garments shown here in the pictures are mediums). Women sizes are 6,8,10,12. Men's sizes 36,38,40,42 and pants are 30,32,34,36. When you select the perk you want, please email us as well so we can make sure we get you the exact size you need. simknitwearcustom@gmail.com

All the perks are made of 100% cotton.

Perk Pictures 

Chevon Scarf perk $56 which comes in both red/ yellow and blue/yellow. Diamond Dress perk $100 which comes in yellow/red and Grey/ red. Shown below.


Chain Sweater $150 shown in both color ways blue/yellow and red/yellow. Binary Sweater $150 that comes in red/grey. Men's Grid pants $120 red/grey on the left.  Women's Diagonal Pants $100 grey/blue in middle. Men's Diagonal Pants $120 on right in blue/yellow. Shown below


Diagonal Blanket $200 in blue/red. Chevron Scarf $56 shown in both blue/yellow and red/yellow. Binary Sweater $150 on left in grey/red.  Chain Sweater$150 red/yellow in middle. Ripple/grid sweater $150 in blue on right. Men's Grid Pants $120 in red/grey on left. Women's Grid pants $100 in grey/blue in middle. Men's Diagonal pants $120 blue/yellow on right.  Shown below.



Diamond Sweater $150 in blue/grey shown below.

Ripple/grid jacket $260 in grey/red shown below.

Matter Blanket Children's $99

 Children’s blanket is 30x30.  Also 10% of the funds raised by this product go to the Sandy Relief Fund.

Matter blanket color options to choose from. Shown below

Matter adult blanket  $180 shown below. The adult blanket is 50x60. Also 10% of the funds raised by this product go to the Sandy Relief Fund.


Caleb Smith art and design Skull Chomp Blanket $235. Shown below.



The custom designing of blanket $300 or scarf $82 perk information

When we transfer your design into knit each pixel in your design will become a stitch. The blankets are 50"-56” wide, which are 866 stitches wide.  And 70"-74” long, which is 1276, stitches long. The scarfs are 5.5”-6” which is 100 stitches. They are 68”-72” long, which are 1300 stitches. Chose up to three colors from below for your custom design. When creating a repeat pattern it will be best for you to create it so you get the exact repeat you want. Then email us a jpg of the design, image or logo with your color list to simknitwearcustom@gmail.com. We will then create your design. Exciting!

story:
Hello my name is Jordan. I'm wanting to start a business that will change the role of landscaping businesses and offer more to customers. Truck & Me is a simple business idea that lets customers "rent" a truck and a worker. I've noticed many times in my community that people don't have the carrying capacity in cars to bring home large and heavy items such as bags of mulch, lumber, grills, and many other items. The idea with Truck & Me is that people will now have the option to bring these items home and have someone help them move and assemble their large purchases. It also offers people a chance to hire a one man labor team for landscaping if the customer bought such things as mulch or plants.

This is a simple idea that I believe has a lot of potential. I'm currently an Indiana University business student and I've been wanting to start my own small business while in school and hopefully develop it into something great. The money from this campaign would be used to buy a truck and all the tools and gear a landscaper would need. I would love for this idea to become a reality and see how far this business could go.

Thanks for reading,

Jordan

story:
Indiegogo Total: $3,004

Campaign Total: $41,984.00

If you want us to receive the whole donation without fees please mail a check or money order to the following address: PO Box 62696, Los Angeles, CA 90062

Support South LA’s First Beyond Organic Produce and Grocery Market

At a time when so many people in our communities are being displaced due to rising rents and property values, help Community Services Unlimited Inc. (CSU) build a permanent presence and community wealth in South LA. We are delighted to announce we have opened escrow on the Paul Robeson building on Vermont Avenue.

The 5,000 square foot building and 10,000 square foot lot means we can build the produce and grocery market South LA needs, create an on-site commercial kitchen and urban farm, and have our offices head-quartered here. We have other exciting ideas for the space we will be sharing with you in the coming weeks.

What we need?

In order to make all this a reality by June 14th we have to raise $200,000 dollars for our down payment and other costs and we take great pride in asking you to support this exciting effort. Finally, a beyond organic market in South LA, built by the people for the people. Support this effort and give what you can, whether that is $5.00 or $50,000.00 every penny counts, so please make a donation now. 

What we have done?

We are honored that so many of you out there have supported CSU’s work to bring affordable high quality food to South Los Angeles. As a result the number of families we serve has grown from 90 in 2007, when we launched the Village Market Place social enterprise, to 8000 by the end of 2014. We now distribute over 100,000 pounds of local beyond organic produce in South LA through a variety of means designed to make access easy and hassle free.

The creation of the VMP has been part of our strategy to build the sustainability of our food justice work. Earnings from the VMP directly support our free community programs like Garden Gateway and From the Ground Up. In 2014 VMP sales amounted to 25% of our annual income. The growth of the VMP has concretely demonstrated something that we have always known; there is a demand for good food in South LA.

Why?

Despite policies and promises corporate super markets come to South LA, take tax credits and public dollars and then leave. 2013 saw the closure of 2 Ralphs stores and we face impending closures of Fresh and Easy stores in and around South LA. Our commitment to transforming the health of our community is long term and multi-faceted. We have been patiently building the VMP and have outgrown our facilities once again and need more space.

How can you help?
  • Donate Dollars
  • Can you help us raise dollars? Host a fundraiser and/or introduce our campaign to your community. 
  • Do you have any personal connections to foundations, banks, or anyone who may support this campaign. Please make an introduction. 
  • Donate Time- Do you have a special skill? Are you a carpenter, electrician, appraiser, painter? Can you offer some of your time to make phone calls?
  • Can you help us install a grey water system?
  • Can you help us install solar panels?
  • Do you have skills with a camera? Help us document this process.

story:
Fund a Traveler, Build a Community!

Broke Compass was founded on adventure, and we think the best way to share our vision is to go on a bold journey and connect with travelers. In order to raise awareness for Broke Compass as well as demonstrate its potential to frequent travelers, we are raising funds to sponsor a traveler’s journey along a portion of the Appalachian Trail. Starting in Great Barrington, Massachusetts it will be a 399 mile journey to Boiling Springs, Pennsylvania through the Appalachian Mountains, one of the most challenging and picturesque hiking trips in the U.S. This ambassador will serve as a representative for Broke Compass, using the app during his or her adventure to connect with other travelers.


Anyone can apply! Our goal is to use this campaign to send an aspiring traveler who couldn't otherwise afford a trip like this, on an adventure of a lifetime. If you have a desire explore the Appalachian Mountains and meet travelers from all walks of life, we encourage you to apply! 

What we're looking for: We're looking for someone with a great attitude, and a passion for travel and meeting new people, who couldn't otherwise afford a trip like this. You don't have to be a super accomplished outdoorsman/woman to be considered. Just tell us what you're passionate about and why you're interested in this journey. 

See below for requirements and directions to apply!


What is Broke Compass?

Broke Compass is an app that fills the gap between experiencing new places, and connecting with other travelers. Users navigate through an interactive map that displays events that other travelers have created. 

Once users find an activity they’re interested in, they join that event, and meet up with a group of fellow travelers and experience a tourist activity together. Whether that activity is taking a tour of an art museum, going on a hike, or simply checking out a cool restaurant, users bond with one another organically, over the shared experience of the group activity and the mutual interest in travel.

Visit our website to check out the Broke Compass beta web app! (Our native app is coming soon!)

Our Story...

My name is David LiCause and I am the founder of Broke Compass. Last Fall I joined a college buddy of mine on a bicycle trip across America. We spent a little over three months on the road, riding through incredible places and meeting amazing people along the way. My friend and I loved being tourists in new and unfamiliar places, and connecting with other travelers that could share these experiences with us. But we found that there was a gap between discovering new places, and connecting with other travelers. There was not a resource that helped to facilitate that connection with other travelers, while we were already away from home. 

Six months ago, Broke Compass was nothing more than a bold idea, from a less than experienced entrepreneur (myself). Since then Broke Compass has evolved into an established startup team, including myself, our talented team of app developers, and mentors throughout the area. 

Our Team

                     The Perks

Sticker

Broke Compass Shirt

Haiku (An example of our poetic prowess...)


                  


How to Apply

Requirements: 

  • Must be free for four weeks in July-August of 2015 (the exact dates for the trip are flexible depending on the individual)
  • Must be physically fit enough to hike everyday for 4 weeks
  • Must have a great attitude, and respect for the outdoors and the Appalachian Trail community
  • Be willing to commit to completing the 399 mile journey from Great Barrington, MA to Boiling Springs, PA 

Directions to apply:

  • Send applications to brokecompassinfo@gmail.com
  • We want to learn some basic information about yourself (listed below), but more importantly show us why you're the perfect fit to represent Broke Compass on the Appalachian Trail! If you think the best way to show this is through an essay, a video, or any other creative medium, the choice is yours!
  • Basic information to include: name (duh), age, where you're from, brief work history, brief education history, your level of outdoor education and experience, and your level of physical conditioning. (Please demonstrate how you achieved your level of outdoor experience and physical conditioning such as being an Eagle Scout, athletic accomplishments, running a marathon, or challenging a bear to an arm wrestling competition and winning!)

        Notice: We do not encourage arm wrestling bears under any circumstances

  • Also include links to your social media pages (using social media will be an important part of sharing your journey with others!


Where the Donations Go

The $3,000 goal is based on the expected travel expenses of hiking a portion of the Appalachian Trail. Your donations will help us provide the necessary gear (tent, hiking boots, backpack, etc), food, lodging (campsites or hostels), transportation to and from the trail, as well as pay for your awesome perks!


Risks & Challenges

From the beginning Broke Compass has been an ambitious startup team with a bold vision.  There are certainly some risks and challenges involved in this campaign and this is how we are addressing them:
  • Safety: Safety is our number one priority in this trip. The first step in ensuring a safe journey is a rigorous selection process from which the Broke Compass Ambassador will be chosen. We're looking for someone who has a proven track record of physical fitness, knowledge of outdoor safety procedures, and mental toughness. We have consulted with experienced thru-hikers to gain an excellent understanding of the challenges involved in this trip. Our team will check in daily with the Broke Compass Ambassador to make sure they have everything they need and are taken care of physically and mentally. We will also provide a solar charger to ensure that the Broke Compass Ambassador always has access to a power source to charge their phone in case of emergency. 
  • Risk of Failure to complete journey: With an endeavor as exciting and ambitious as this there is always the risk of failure. Our primary concern is the safety of the Broke Compass Ambassador, and to that end we will make every preparation possible to ensure a safe and successful journey. In order to minimize the risk of failure we will only select a candidate that is physically fit and has a proven track record of outdoor experience and knowledge. We will also shower the Broke Compass Ambassador with encouragement and positive energy throughout the trip! 


Timeline


Other Ways You Can Help

Are you broke and not able to contribute to our campaign? No worries! You can still help us accomplish our vision. Please 'donate' a tweet or Facebook post through our Thunderclap page! (click here) This will act as a social media time bomb that will go off 3 days before our campaign ends to spread the word about Broke Compass. Also, don't forget to sign up through our website and help us reach our goal of getting 10,000 users!

In order to minimize the risk of failure we will only select a candidate that is physically fit and has a proven track record of outdoor experience and knowledge. We will also shower the Broke Compass Ambassador with encouragement and positive energy throughout the trip! 





Timeline




Other Ways You Can Help Are you broke and not able to contribute to our campaign? No worries! You can still help us accomplish our vision. Please 'donate' a tweet or Facebook post through our Thunderclap page! (click here) This will act as a social media time bomb that will go off 3 days before our campaign ends to spread the word about Broke Compass. Also, don't forget to sign up through our website and help us reach our goal of getting 10,000 users!

story:
A Little More About Me

Much like many of us, my past is filled with difficulties, emotional scars, and obstacles that I needed to overcome. When I was growing up, my father was a heroin addict and an alcoholic. I constantly fell in and out of deep depressions as a teen and even thought about ending my life on two occasions.

I was dealt many "lemons" in life. But, I didn't allow my circumstances dictate my future. You see, along my rough journey, I chose to "make lemonade". Despite the difficulties in my past, I learned to lean on my faith & family in order to do those things I’m most passionate about. And THIS is one of them. 

Twenty years later, I am currently a youth pastor, speaker, videographer, aspiring entrepreneur, husband, and father of two. My father is clean & sober and my family is tight-knit and we truly enjoy our time together.

I've worked with pre-teens, teens, young adults, and adults in guiding them and helping them overcome their obstacles. And now, I want to serve people on a broader scale. Will you help?

The Needs

There are a few things needed to get this project started. Among them are subscriptions to:

  • Marketing Tools
  • E-mail Responders
  • Webinar Software 
  • Opt-In pages
  • SEO
Other items needed will help with:

  • Video Recording & Editing
  • Sound Equipment
  • Purchase of an LLC

The Desired Impact Make Your Lemonade Will Have

The saying, "When life give you lemons, make lemonade", is an oldie. You might be shaking your head, thinking it’s cliché and over-used. You’re absolutely right! But, it’s cliché and over-used because it’s rarely put into action! If you really think about it, the old saying holds merit!

What it means is: We can’t change our past, but we CAN learn from it and even accept it in order to progress in life. There are certain things in life that we have zero control over and we certainly don't get a "do-over" with mistakes we've made in our pasts.

However, we have the ability to re-direct our lives, we CAN deal with our circumstances to propel us toward thriving in life, and we WILL prevail at anything we put our minds to. Yes, we CAN "make lemonade".

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this link on your social media pages!
  • Share #MakeYourLemonade as well!
  • Email people on your list about it!
  • Talk about it at work!
  • The more the word gets out there, the MORE the word gets out there! :)

story:
Click Here To See All Perks

Quick Facts

These Bomb Detection Super Dogs and New Amazing Bomb Detection Training and Operational Method are Badly Needed Right Now To Protect US From Terrorism!

                                                  GDS Tactical K9’s Are:  

1) Super Fast - Much, Much Faster than conventionally trained bomb dogs; reducing a one hour search to one minute!

2) Pinpoint Accurate -  Bomb Detection Super Dogs show you exactly where the bomb is; down to the size of a quarter!  Super Accuracy! Super Safety! Lives Saved!

 3) Completely Reliable -  When they indicate odor is there  - ODOR IS THERE! When they don't indicate; there is no odor. 

 4) Super Versatile -  They do things other dogs can't do!                                                 *  GDS Bomb Detection Super Dogs do many more types of searches than                       conventionally trained bomb dogs.                                                                                               *  GDS Bomb Detection Super Dogs perform brand new types of searches;                       never possible before this amazing new method!

 5) Hypersensitive to Odor - responding to tiny amounts of residual odor, like Gun Shot Residue on a Bad Guy's hands, skin or clothing, Even over three weeks old! 

6) Hyper Reactive to Odor - showing an extreme and obvious reaction to the first encounter with the bomb odor. The handler knows his Bomb Detection Super Dog is reacting; No Doubt About It!  Faster, More Accurate, Totally Reliable, Super Versatile! 

                                             A Huge Advancement!!!

These Bomb Detection Super Dogs provide detailed information about the bomb odor that conventionally trained dogs do not; 

How long has it been there?  

How much is there? 

Exactly, precisely, where is the odor?  

                                                 Why Contribute?

Contributing to this campaign and these Bomb Detection Super Dogs will prevent terrorist attacks and save innocent children from loosing their legs and lives around the world.  

Contributing to this campaign will protect our soldiers from coming home with missing arms and legs, or not coming home at all!  

Contributing to this campaign can and will stop another Boston Marathon Bombing!

Contributing to this campaign can and will Contributing to this campaign can and will prevent another Charlie Hebdo from ever happening! 

Everyone is at risk and contributing to this campaign will benefit everyone! 

This is a huge, significant advancement in Counter Terrorism through K9 Bomb Detection and we need it right now! 

Think about the people you love and what you would be willing to do to stop a terrorist attack from hurting or killing them.  

Contributing to this campaign could save that person or people you love one day.  

Like Alan Turing's A-Machine that broke the Nazi code and saved millions of lives in World War II; Bomb Detection Super Dogs has broken the code of hidden bombs and terrorist weapons caches and we need it right now to save countless innocent lives!

See This Amazing Bomb Detection Technology Featured on Military.com

                                                    Contribute Now And Let's Roll!!!    


                      How GDS Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Dogs Compare

Conventionally Trained Bomb Dogs take 45 minutes to over one hour to search an open area or field, using a tedious grid pattern, closely controlled by the handler.

GDS Bomb Detection Super Dogs take 1 to 4 minutes to search the same area, off-leash, independently and always find any available odor!

Conventionally Trained Bomb Dogs indicate that the bomb is in a large, general area; i.e., most often 4 feet long by 4 feet high to 10 feet long by 10 feet high; requiring a long, tedious, time consuming, dangerous hand search by the Bomb Squad.


GDS Bomb Detection Super Dogs indicate exactly where the bomb odor is down to the size of a quarter! On the tip of their nose!!! This tells the Bomb Squad to look “Right There!” saving time, lives and limbs.

What Is The GDS Revolutionary New Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Method?

A Completely New, Revolutionary and Super-Effective Bomb Detection Technology. 

  Merriam-Webster Definition of Technology:   

"The application of scientific knowledge for a practical purpose;                        especially in industry."

Just like Modern Jet Fighters replaced old, outdated, slow propeller airplanes of World War II, The GDS Revolutionary New Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Method is a completely new Bomb Detection Technology - and Tactical K9 System for quickly and accurately finding bombs, weapons caches and terrorists with our Bomb Detection Super Dogs.

After 25 years of research and development, Shawn Deehan Animal Behaviorist, Working Dog Trainer, President an CEO of Global Dynamic Security, Inc. and GDS have produced a revolutionary, new behavioral science model for understanding the K9 brain and resulting training method to train that brain to quickly, accurately and reliably find bombs. This model and method are based on the universal laws of Evolution and resulting K9 behaviors.  In many ways these discoveries are the opposite of long held beliefs about K9 behavior and result in consistently superior, unprecedented K9 performance. The GDS Revolutionary New Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Program utilizes a new physical science model, pioneered by Shawn Deehan, that accurately and correctly re-defines the physical characteristics of odor.  This new model is scientifically derived and provides handlers and trainers new information to understand bomb odor; how it moves, what effects odor and what factors need to be considered in each search.  Every detail of producing Bomb Detection Super Dogs has been carefully addressed by scientific design; from the way these amazing dogs are cared for and fed, to the very specific and scientific handling and training method.  The amazing result is Bomb Detection Super Dogs with an extreme response to bomb odor, ammunition odor and any target odor to which they are conditioned to respond and a supper accurate and specific indication.

These Bomb Detection Super Dogs seem to say; “It’s Right There!!!”  This method gives K9 Handlers the new and unprecedented ability to find hidden bomb factories and pick terrorists out of a crowd!  

We need this critical new tool in the war against terrorism now! 

Bomb Detection Super Dogs give our team the edge just as Night Vision when it was introduced to modern warfare!

                        Contribute Now and Give Our Team The Edge!!!


What The Experts Say:



David Barth  

"These are the best I've ever seen! If you want to save lives; these are the dogs you need, right now!"

CIA Senior Intelligence Officer Ret. ,

Budget Dir. -House Intel.Committee Ret.        

Senior Advisor - Director of Homeland Security Ret.



Tim Murphy

"These are the top.  They're the Top!" 

President Virginia Police Canine Association Ret.

SWAT Team Commander, Orange County Sheriffs Office

Police K9 Handler 19 years - Five K9 Partners

                                                  K9 Handler Training

Handlers are extensively educated in our leading edge, proprietary Behavioral Science Model, Training and Handling Method over a six-week training period.  This thorough, comprehensive training course addresses every aspect of caring for, feeding, keeping, maintaining and handling these amazing animals. We equip our handlers with the tools to win in the war against terrorism.

                                                   K9 Team Support

Handler Dog Teams are coached, advised and carefully guided by the GDS Executive Tactical K9 Team, for a period of one year after they return home;  resulting in effective maintenance and continued advancement in the performance of these Bomb Detection Super Dogs.  This practice ensures client satisfaction and extraordinary Bomb Detection. The client's handlers and Bomb Detection Super Dogs get better and better over time.


                                            Why do we need this money?

We have invested over 25 years of hard work, money, research and development to bring you this amazing, life-saving, game-changing Bomb Detection Technology. Now, we need your help to put hundreds, and ultimately thousands of Bomb Detection Super Dogs in the fight against terrorism to find and stop terrorists from hurting and killing our soldiers, citizens and innocent, peaceful people around the world.  Just imagine that we can stop the next Boston Marathon bombing. Your contribution to this crowd funding campaign can and  will make a real difference in saving lives and limbs!

Construction: GDS will construct a number of specially designed, Bomb Detection Super Dog Kennels, providing the ideal resting environment as well as Training and Teaching buildings.

Tactical K-9's and Training: GDS Selects the top performing K-9 candidates from Holland at between one and two years of age. These top performers come at a premium cost and require careful and expert selection; resulting in Bomb Detection Super Dogs.

Administration:  GDS maintains an administrative staff that efficiently and effectively  assists in running the show and keeping the Tactical K-9 Team in the field training.

Land: More Tactical K-9s trained requires more land.  GDS has selected small and large plats to expand as quickly as much as your contributions allow and bring this life saving Bomb Detection Technology to the fight against Terrorism!

             Beyond money — We need your help spreading the word!

At its heart, the GDS Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Program is grass roots, home-grown story of  American ingenuity. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still join the GDS Tactical K9 Team and help make history!

                                                Ways you can help:

•  Share this video.

•  Spread the word about Bomb Detection Super Dogs on Facebook and Twitter

•  Stay connected: Follow us on Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on

•  Bomb Detection Super Dogs

•  Tell Your Friends and Family and Dog Lovers Everywhere!

The Expansion and Roll Out Plan

GDS will expand this amazing Bomb Detection Technology and Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Program no matter what happens with this campaign.  Your contributions can make it all happen much, much more quickly and save many lives in the  process!

                                                  It’s All Up To You!!!

Depending on the response and total contributions; GDS will build several new specially designed working dog kennels and ad kennel staff and assistant trainers. 

Should we surpass our initial goal to the medium goal of $500,000; GDS will purchase a 15 acre plot of land near our research and development facility and build an additional 100 kennel training facility. 

If the amount in contributions is large enough, over 3,000,000, GDS has found a very large, 1,300 acre property on which we will build the largest Tactical K9 Bomb Detection Training Center in the world. 

Let’s get as many Bomb Detection Super Dogs is the fight against Terrorism now! 


Click Here To See All Perks





Global Impact

For the first time in the War On Terrorism, Counter Terrorist Units will have a new-offensive K9 weapon to find invisible bad guys, hidden bomb factories, secret weapons caches and covert terrorist head quarters here in the United States and among populations around the world. Counter Terrorist Units can use these Bomb Detection Super Dogs in an offensive, pro-active way.  Instead of waiting for terrorists to strike; the good guys can “Go And Get ‘Em!”  These Bomb Detection Super Dogs will make it nearly impossible for terrorists to hide anymore.

Your contribution to this campaign will save lives, prevent horrible injuries and  change the War On Terrorism in our favor!

The Big Dogs!

Be a Big Dog and make a big contribution. The world needs as many Bomb Detection Super Dogs in the fight as possible!  If you are a Big Dog and can make a Big Dog Contribution Go For it!  Big Dog Contributions can be anonymous or named to you or your business, company or corporation. Contributions over 100,000 will garner a kennel building dedicated to the veteran, k9, or contributor's name.  Contributor's choice.  Be A Big Dog!!!

See It With Your Own Eyes!

- $5,000.00 Plus Team Member Demonstrations Available -

For new Team Members contributing $5,000.00 plus, GDS can arrange private Bomb Detection Super Dog demonstrations. 

                     Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

If you live in the US, shipping is free. For all other destinations, please add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.

    I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra $30 for shipping. 

How can I increase the amount?

No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "No Perk, Just a Contribute.

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll

be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

story:
Our Greek team with the help of international experts are currently launching the EURO Drachma. We have e wallets apps running already in Greek.

You can download it here: details

We have the only viable and working solution to restart the local Greek economy by and for the people. Creating a local national Complementary Currency called the EURO DRACHMA.

This local currency is to be used side by side with conventional currencies such as the EURO.




Short Summary

This is an emergency! We have already gathered a large team of volunteers in Greece working on launching the new EURO DRACHMA currency for the Greek people and by the Greek people and we need your support.

Banks and governments in Greece and in many highly indebted countries are failing or will fail. Greece is a showcase in which banks and technocrats are trying to apply the same old failed methods to solve debt and financial problems that they themselves created and are unable to solve. Letting them continue like that is madness. Exit that and welcome the new digital money and economy.  

  • Our Greek team has joined with PayServices Inc., an international company specialized in providing knowhow and methods in reinventing local and international financial systems by bringing to individuals, merchants and organizers technology, applications, new currencies and tools for large scale launch using available technologies such as phones, smartphones, cards, solutions for the old or non techie as well as merchant terminals that can be rolled out quickly and efficiently.

  • This campaign is important for me, you and us because the current constant growth to pay for the interest on our debts is creating the need for ever greater taxes and is depleting our energy and the earth's resources. It is a modern type slavery trend which moves all the richness and values from those that produce to those that control the flow of money. This has to change and it has to change now. We need you for that now!

  • You will help to develop a new economy and society by the people and for the people. Let's put the individual back at the center of society. It will make any citizen sovereign and will help create development which is much more needed than the unnecessary financial growth needed to repay unnecessary debt. 

Make a contribution. It can be of any size small or large, show us that you care. Tomorrow the same can happen in your city or country as well. Whatever you can and whatever you give helps. 


What We Need & What You Get

Why we need you and why the time is right now:

  • We are asking for USD 11,000,000 - Is that a lot? Yes, it is a big amount. But bear in mind that there are 11 millions citizens in Greece. Playing on the economies of scale, this amount will enable us to help the Greeks to provide each Greek citizen young and old with a new Euro Drachma account he or she can start using immediately with their phones, cards and PC's to buy basic things creating a circular local economy and exchange.
  • We are raising USD and not EURO because in the Indiegogo system, only USD can be accepted for credit cards we will convert the currency as needed. 
  • Local circular economy and the EURO DRACHMA currency help keep the richness and added value created by the working people locally in the country where it is most needed. 
  • We need this money to reach each and every village, each and every person and business, teach them how to use the new complementary system and continue developing it. We have already translated our App's into Greek and we are launching already a much upgraded Greek speaking app with many various other solutions needed by the people running on all major smartphones platforms (iPhones, Androids, BlackBerry and Windows Phones), older phones as well as tools that even an 80 year old can understand and use. 
  • Our team members and volunteers in Greece are already interacting with many common citizens, merchants, stakeholders, NGOs, municipalities, journalists... and all have shown interest and are excited by this project. Our team of volunteers grows very quickly. 

Have you heard about the Butterfly Effect Theory? It is said that by a chain reaction the flaps of one Butterfly on one side of the ocean can create a storm on the other? We believe that each one of us can be that Butterfly. 

  • Anyone contributing at least USD 50 will receive the Butterfly effect card with the amount he or she contributed in USD but in EURO DRACHMA currency to spend in Greece and participating merchants online in order to create a global butterfly effect and community.
  • For the additional funds we will gain, we will spend them on creating more technology, licensing and marketing  for the sovereign individual, communities, tribes, municipalities and citizens of the world. 


                


The Impact

How your contribution will make a difference:

  • It is the only viable project there is. Don't expect the IMF, the EU, the bankers or the Greek Government collectively to solve this issue, they cannot. They are using tools that have failed time and time again. They all have various and contradicting agendas in which the Greek people are just a parameter.  

  • Our project is important because in times of crisis great opportunities open up! This is the time for an intelligent and exciting change.

  • You all have heard about the BitCoin. However, the BitCoin, interesting by its technology is complex to use: one BitCoin is worth about 250 EUR, how would you pay for a 0.30 € piece of bread with such a huge size unit? Also, the Open Source thousands of servers world wide need to approuve each and every transaction and this can take up to 12 minutes. Totally unusable in a supermarket where people are cuing to pay for their purchases. BitCoins did not help apart from many techies any community to this day. PayServices is using a different approach, enabling real time immediate transfer of value while working with local communities, municipalities and tribes to provide them with self governing tools to make them sovereign and this includes their own currencies and tools to manage it themselves for themselves. Together we can do the same for Greece and the Greek people.  

  • The impact will be huge because the current financial system is totally inefficient and adds a huge burden on working men and women. Many of the banking IT systems are built on batch transactions transmission software from the 1970's, sometimes still running on the Cobol language which no one knows how to modify anymore or packages they bought or rent and on which they have no control whatsoever. The PayServices Inc. system which we intend to use, has been built from the ground up totally in-house using the latest most powerful servers, is fully real time, certified PCI DSS Level I, the most difficult and secured certification in the payment and IT related industry.   


Risks & Challenges

The greatest risk is from the institutional banking industry and governments which will try to keep on controlling the money flow. You and I and we as individuals and communities, we have a natural right to breath and live and prosper and the more we are the more effect and chances for success we have.

  • The PayServices system we want to use represents a collective 45 years of development (3 years for 15 dedicated developers full time). There is still much to do and it is a work in progress but this is the time to help. Many tools exist and are used already and some are still to be launched. However, it is the most advanced toolset around today for exactly this kind of situations.  We are very fortunate to have it.
  • Our plan is to provide our local team with all they need to seek out as many individuals, communities, municipalities, merchants and groups to get their accounts up and running this summer. 


Supported by world renowned expert Prof. Lietaer

Prof. Bernard Lietaer, teachings, inspiration and books have been used to help PayServices Inc. design and implement the Complementary Currency mechanisms needed for the EURO DRACHMA. Author of many books including The Future of Money (translated into 18 languages), Prof. Bernard Lietaer is an international expert in the design and implementation of currency systems. He has studied and worked in the field of money for more than 30 years in an unusually broad range of capacities including as a Central Banker, a fund manager, a university professor, and a consultant to governments in numerous countries, multinational corporations, and community organizations.


He co-designed and implemented the convergence mechanism to the single European currency system (the Euro) and served as president of the Electronic Payment System at the National Bank of Belgium (the Belgian Central Bank). He co-founded and managed GaiaCorp, a top performing currency fund whose profits funded investments in environmental projects.

Prof. Bernard Lietaer has warned then and now that the way the Euro was created, creating extremely efficient financial systems and ever bigger currency systems is the same as creating a forest with only one sort of tree. 

This is not sustainable because if a specific disease attacks only that certain type of tree the whole forest will die. However, having many species in a forest, the loss of one is quickly replaced by another. The situation in Greece today is yet another proof that the way the Euro is failing and is designed is not sustainable. 

Many local currencies have long existed in Europe. Did you know that 95% of European cathedrals, huge and expensive undertakings were build between the years 1000 and 1300? It is thought that it was thanks to the wide use of many local (city) currencies. It is probable that the end of that great economic prosperity period ended only due to the arrival of the black powder, enabling the use of big canons that no city walls would withstand and sending Europe into turnmoil. 

The Euro by analogy is the black powder destroying the city walls driving many economies into chaos.       

A former professor of International Finance at the University of Louvain, he has also taught at Sonoma State University and Naropa University. He is currently a Research Fellow at the Center for Sustainable Resources of the University of California at Berkeley. He is also a member of the Club of Rome, a Fellow of the World Academy of Arts and Sciences, the World Business Academy, and the European Academy of Sciences and Arts.

Bernard Lietaer has written numerous books and articles about money systems, including Of Human Wealth (forthcoming, 2011), Monnaies Régionales (2008), The Mystery of Money (2000), and Au Coeur de la Monnaie (2003).


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please relay this information in the media, on social media, to your friends and family. If you are in Greece and want to join us, please feel free to contact us immediately.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Start now, and join our cause.

story:
Breve reseña

Los colaboradores financian ideas con las que se sienten apasionados y a la gente en la que confían. Estas son algunas cosas que puedes hacer en esta sección:

  • Preséntate y cuenta tu historia.
  • Describe brevemente tu campaña y explica por qué es importante para ti.
  • Expresa la magnitud de lo que logrará la ayuda de los colaboradores.

Recuerda, sé breve pero personal. Pregúntate: si alguien dejara de leer aquí, ¿estaría listo para colaborar?

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Presenta más detalles:

  • explica cuánto financiamiento necesitas y a dónde va. Sé transparente y específico, la gente necesita confiar en ti para que quiera financiarte.
  • Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
  • Describe a dónde van los fondos si no logras la meta total.

El impacto

Explica tu campaña en mayor detalle y cuéntale a la gente la diferencia que hará su contribución:

  • explica por qué tu proyecto es valioso para el colaborador y para el mundo.
  • Describe tu historial de éxito en proyectos como este (si lo tienes).
  • Haz que la gente lo sienta real y genera confianza.

Riesgos y desafíos

Las personas valoran tu transparencia. Sé abierto y destácate al proveer perspectivas sobre los riesgos y obstáculos que puedes enfrentar en el camino hacia lograr tu meta.

  • Comparte lo que hace que te destaques para superar estos obstáculos.
  • Describe tu plan para solucionar estos desafíos.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar:

  • pídele a la gente que difunda tu campaña y que genere eco.
  • Recuérdale que use las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

Y eso es todo.

story:
Short Summary

Chase and Sarah have decided to fulfill a mutual dream of opening and running a functional fitness facility in the Kansas City area.  They both have a passion for the sport, the methodologies and the community. Their goal?  To share all they have learned with others and to build a community that supports each other individually and as a team.
     So what does Fitness Isn't Free mean exactly? To better describe it; fitness is an endeavor that can weigh heavily on us, to include mentally, physically, and in some cases spiritually. We want our community to know that regardless of the struggles they face in and out of the gym, we recognize that it’s not just the monetary side of things that cost us in our pursuits. We want them to know we are here for them and want to be the community they look too in order to achieve their goals.
     We would love to have you join our community, but we know that's not everyone's cup of tea!  There are many ways you can help support us.  Even if you aren't able to donate, spread the word to friends and family using the Indiegogo share tools!
     Our goal is for a soft opening in December and grand opening in January!!  Keep an eye on our page for progress pictures and videos!  If you have any questions please contact Sarah at sarahesauer@yahoo.com.

Meet the Coaches

  • Chase Knight: Crossfit Level 1 Trainer, USA Weightlifting Level 1 Coach
  • Sarah Sauer: Crossfit Level 1 Trainer
  • Roberto Cruz: Crossfit Level 1 Trainer, Crossfit Kids Certified
  • Whitney Carrión: Crossfit Level 1 Trainer, Crossfit Strongman Certified
  • Logan McNeeley: Crossfit Level 1 Trainer, LDHS – Loomis Digestive Health Specialist

The Impact

Your donations will help us get up and running sooner and able to offer you with:

  • Functional Fitness Classes
  • Intro and Foundations Classes
  • Olympic Weightlifting Classes
  • Yoga Classes
  • Personal Training
  • Gym events and more!

Risks & Challenges

  • There's always a risk...not enough equipment, not enough members, not enough money.  With the leadership and broad range of skills in place you can have confidence in that we will do everything in our power to not only be successful but to create a thriving community of athletes.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell your family and friends about our new facility!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign and help get the word out!

story:
What do I want to create ?
I would like to establish a company which is going to take care of the basic human needs such as housing, food, water, electricity, internet, house plants, basic furniture, clothes and also computers(educational purposes) at non profit.

How would we run non-profit?
Through the initial donation we would get plenty to start and build up plenty that will help people's life straight away and once the system has been completed to "provide" housings we will start to make an attempt to „purchase” houses away from the current owners who (to sustain themselves in our current economy) are currently running it for a profit and once enough progress has been made we will look to implement the next steps such as making electricity, internet, water, food, house plants, etc... steadily available for everyone (worldwide).

At the same time we will when the donations are sufficient to increase our „ownership” of houses use our then gained position in our world to provide loans at non-profit and make it voluntarily to pay more or if you move at an earlier moment away from the flat that you wanted to get through our support receive the option to get a new apartment and we will keep the old flat and make it available for someone new.

And eventually empty houses will become available for services similar to AirBNB until someone needs it for living (donate as much as you want and sleep free model).

What else would I use this money for ?
The money would also be used to index our current global-social system so that these processes become easier to understand by common people (such as myself) and also help the government in providing this service for which we pay our taxes.

The result of this application would be that you can manage the work that you perform (including job hunting) and when the situation becomes applicable you can forward all the needed details to the needed location so that you no longer have to deal with the following situation:

The same I want to do with when you need housing that your request will be forwarded by you to to the organization in your area (until we have our own properties available and are stabilized).

Will there be more to this system then what I have mentioned so far?
Yes. At the same time we will index the things that come to matter when moving for a job such as acquiring a passport, visa, work, relocation, welfare and where possible make this part of the system so that with a click of a button the needed information is provided to the agency's responsible for dealing with these things. 

This will become one of the main priorities in order to have as quick as possible a better product on the market then we currently have for the things previously mentioned (in the above part).

Besides this we will also attempt to index all current jobs and future jobs(for job seekers) and give the option to the people to rank their own job as essential, automatable (such as plenty of finance jobs, administration jobs, etc) so that we become aware which jobs can be performed automated by systems or perhaps as useless and we will (without revealing the source) promote that these jobs  will be (partly) scrapped from the job market.

Is there a special reason for doing this all?
The reason why we will do this is that it is essential information to know if a new economy can be created based on my ideals but also to keep a live counter on our future website which shows the number of all the jobs currently being performed by people and calculate how this adds up compared to the amount of people able to work and add a different counter of how many jobs are not essential in order to convince people that we have more people then jobs and that being „unemployed” is unavoidable.

And perhaps most important we will take in calculation the amount of people who died from murder, suicide and war crimes to showcase that if we continue our current path that it increases the earliest opportunity to retire (at an earlier age).

What is the (expected) main goal of doing all of this?
I hope that once everyone has equality that world peace can exist and that as an added benefit that all of us can experience a much shorter working life in this system and I hope that we can manage things within a period from 10 up-to 15 years which can be calculated for achievability after we have the numbers of total jobs/humans on this planet so that afterwards people will be more willing to support our cause and allow us build a new system and replace our current system; in which we most likely need to work until we are 70 (in order to make the system work in the first place).

If it is achievable then it is my opinion that we should have a mandatory work period that starts at the age of 25 and lasts until you are 35 or 40 while having the option to work before hand as well in order to give you a chance to get a reduction in the years to work later on when it is „mandatory” and also having the option to work afterwards so that other people who are less comfortable with working this long can receive a reduction in the years to work.

Depending on the outcome I hope that people will decide that they will work non-profit and that people only perform essential tasks for being able to live such as transportation, reparation, house building, farming, etc and that what people decide as essential and have the option to work in this area for some years and afterwards retire when you choose to do so.

The currency which becomes logical to use when everyone works non-profit is simply "the work period in life or better said: the average age at which people go on pension" but it could fairly well be something else and should trigger an effect that people will value life of other human beings more as each death means that the age of retirement would increase ("If everyone helps with a large task, it will get done easily and quickly"). 

Why I want to do this?
The reason why I want to do this is because we live in a world where the basic human needs are not available for everyone and these people need to struggle to make the end of the month, which is something that forces these people to focus on the „now” and less on the „future” while on the same hand they cannot function as they want because they might need to save expenses by eating less which has an impact on their focus and these people also have children who might be affected in a similar way causing them to under-perform in school which has an entire different range of problems attached to it as well such as illnesses like depression and cancer (which could had been prevented if they had a proper diet or the lack of stress from making it until the end of the month).

Another reason is that I do not believe that there are enough (essential) jobs to go around and that we should accept this fact and not judge people who are not working (with other words receiving social-benefits) for three reasons;

1.  The system is failing and this is why we have the system of social care in the first place place

2.  if you pressure people in pushing them to find works you are in some cases pushing them to provide a service (such as giving massage, sex, cook for others*, clean for others*, creating gossip newspapers, gambling joints,  etc) of which some jobs should not exist unless people who do the jobs say that the work is essential if not then to expect these type of services is in a sense a slavery enforced by social pressure and the economical system all in order to sustain yourself in the current economy in which we treat each other cheaply and very much like a product instead of as humans all in order to feed an economy which has never provided all the basic needs such as housing, food, water, etc to everyone and which I believe with some very simple changes could exist if there would be a support group.

* I am NOT against supporting people in this who truly need it such as the elderly, disabled and the ill.

3. The need for profit drives a market to achieve maximum profit without thinking about factors such as efficiency, man-hours, durability, resources and the actual cost versus profit.. to further maximize they use differences in law's such as minimal wage and also currency differences, which means you hire with intent someone cheaper and while it is good for that local economy the hidden message is "you are not equal" and still the need for money drives people to accept these jobs even if it drives them to suicide.

More reasons:
Instead of complaining about politicians I believe that the people who say they do good are failing in their tasks as the problems are difficult to solve in our current system and that's why I want to take steps away from the standard business concept. Then there is also the fact that instead of complaining I would rather step up and make an attempt to change things because if you complain then you need to have the courage to also step up.

What personal reasons do I have for doing this?
It is because I come from a family in which i experienced a wide range of issues such as child abuse, second hand smoking, being abandoned by my own mother, living in an orphanage, having a father who is addicted to alcohol and cigarettes, having been placed back by my own government with this man who also was at one point addicted to gambling (in which I have been told he made plenty of dept), one of my parents emptied my savings-account(it is unknown whom as the resources to find out outweigh the benefits), having had a sex-changed „stepmother” who was prevented by my own government from having contact with me after I was placed back with my father and unfortunately much more to strongly wish for change in this world as these things exists and are possible because people NEED to be selfish in order to survive in our economy or are sanctioned to do wrong after they already ensured their survival long after they have come to pass away.

Why do I not enter politics to create this?
Regulations have shown me that doing things within politics takes up a lot of time and if people donate it is a clear proof that the majority of the world wants a change as I propose and wish to create.
Will I (once) enter politics?
I think that once things are ready and I notice that there is a support group then I have every intention to make a change; by entering the upcoming elections in 2017 or 2021 in my home country (Netherlands).

Why do I ask for 7 billion euro?

(This number has somewhat of a meaning and is why I did not go for a smaller amount such as for example €- 250.000 – because I think that the number can become a message and represent something, for example

-  It can represent a signal to the world that people do not want war and have a rough % estimate of people who do not want ANY war or conflict at all in this world.

- It can also be a social experiment: not everyone on our planet can donate €- 1 so if we do not achieve the main target then this means either that people have no faith in my project, no credit card, no internet or perhaps even that the system of the very rich contributing to the poor is not working as well as we would hope it might.

To track this I have created a perk inside indiegogo which you activate when you donate 1 euro and is one that we expect to achieve automatically once everyone in the world has every basic human need (for this reason I ask anyone that reads this to share this page with their friends and acquaintances).

would get plenty to start and build up plenty that will help people's life
straight away and once the system has been completed to "provide"
housings we will start to make an attempt to „purchase” houses away from the
current owners who (to sustain themselves in our current economy) are
currently running it for a profit and once enough progress has been made we
will look to implement the next steps such as making electricity, internet,
water, food, house plants, etc...
steadily available for everyone (worldwide).

At the same time we will when the
donations are sufficient to increase our „ownership” of houses use our then
gained position in our world to provide loans at non-profit and make it
voluntarily to pay more or if you move at an earlier moment away from the flat
that you wanted to get through our support receive the option to get a new
apartment and we will keep the old flat and make it available for someone new.

become available for services similar to AirBNB until someone needs it for
living (donate as much as you want and sleep free model).

index our current global-social system so that these processes become easier to

different counter of how many jobs are not essential in order to convince

story:
I am Gina Hamlin I am the Acupuncturist for Golden Dragonfly Acupuncture. I came to Acupuncture by way of Birth defects, a messed up surgery and Pain. I was looking for a way to help with it, I understood from the start that there may never be a cure but searching for a way to help deal with it other then Drugs. I started as a patent 16 years ago (1999). I had to retire from my work in 2003 because of the surgery after a few years to get better I decided to learn formally how to do acupuncture so as to be able to help others. I Graduated from The Academy for Five Element Acupuncture in Gainesville Fla. August 2013 with a Masters in Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Studies.  My Husband Guy Wells and I opened the office here in January 2015.

We have invested a considerable amount of our savings in this dream to help and assist others. We opened here for a couple reasons; One we live here this is our Home town . The second is this is a underserved area I am the only full time Acupuncturist in Caroline Co. Md. I wished to bring to the area the benefits of this form of medicine. I am also a Reiki Master and Guy is a long time Reiki Practitioner and is also a Pangu Qigong Instructor ( Pangu Qigong is a form of Qigong that allows a individual to build their Qi energy which improves their Health and is very simple to learn).

We currently run a Free Veterans Clinic twice a month at the Local American Legion to give back to our veterans and their families for their sacrifice. While we offer regular private acupuncture services along with the Chinese Herbals, we are looking at offering Community Acupuncture Services a couple days a week.

story:
Hi! Thank you for checking out our campaign. We are Third House Books & Coffee. With your help we hope to open an independent bookstore and coffee shop in downtown Gainesville. Bookstores have been slowly disappearing from our community over the last few years. We hope to once again fill that void at the cultural center of Gainesville.

We will be opening in the former dining room of The Wine & Cheese Gallery. This unique space provides us with the great opportunity to be located downtown, in heart of Gainesville's cultural scene. The floor to ceiling windows, potential for sidewalk seating, and two level storefront will set us a part from our neighbors and past iterations of local bookstores.

Community is very important to us, so Third House Books & Coffee plans on being a destination space, where locals and visitors will come to relax, browse, and socialize. We are excited to become an integral part of the community, and to serve your needs and passions, whether that be reading and writing groups, community activism, art shows, author readings and visits, and other social events. In short, we plan on being your neighbor, not just your bookstore.


Our campaign is asking for $15,000. Your donation will be helping us to beautify and upgrade the space, to make it a comfortable and warm place for you to spend your time. Floors, wall repair, bathroom upgrades, and electrical upgrades are among some of those planned improvements. 

In addition, your support will go directly to building an inventory that encourages exploration and support local and independent writers. We will listen intently to what you want in the store and will work hard to be the bookstore you can rely on for the perfect gift or new addition to your library. The rest of your support will go to developing partnerships with local vendors so that we too can contribute to and support local business, artists, and writers.

What do you get out of this? In general supporting local business means investing in your community. An abandoned building is beautified, local artists get a space to sell their art, a new community space is developed for leisure and community activism. You're keeping your hard earned money in our community, contributing to environmental sustainability, and finally, investing in product diversity. In short, you help to make Gainesville a unique and special place.

Ah, but what do you actually GET? You get discounts!

  • $10 - a free Third House Books sticker and bookmark. Bring them into the store for a 5% discount off future purchases.
  • $25 - a free Third House Books sticker, bookmark, and totebag. Bring them into the store for a 5% discount off future purchases.
  • $50 - 10% discount card valid for the first year of business.
  • $100 - Free 1-year readers club membership (see details below).
  • $500+ - Free Lifetime readers club membership (see details below).

The Reader's Club Membership
The Third House Books Readers Club gives you a 10% purchase discount for anything in the store at anytime. In addition, you may read any title in the store for free as long as you read it while in the store. Once you have finished the title, you may purchase that title or another gently read title at a 30% discount. Other holiday and special event discounts may apply.


Gainesville is one of the top ten fastest growing cities in the nation. With the the University of Florida’s goal of pre-eminence and the buildout of the Innovation Hub, Gainesville is quickly becoming the intellectual center of the state of Florida.  And though primarily based in the STEM areas of study, often what comes with intellectual hubs is growth in the arts. For we all need a way to unwind at the end of the day, whether that be with a classic cocktail at The Dime, show at High Dive, a game of pool at Palomino, a burger at Loosey’s, a craft beer at House of Beer, or a good book. And that is where Third House Books & Coffee comes in. We will cater to the growing intellectual community and current creative community that needs a space to browse the latest in independent fiction, poetry, and nonfiction. Not to mention a good cup of coffee while putting the finishing touches on their latest story or article or just another place to relax and read some of the best books and magazines the world over has to offer.

Your support will help us be apart of this new and exciting growth in Gainesville. You will be a part of a local community who values and supports each other in an effort to simply make life a little bit better. Third House Books intends to be an integral part of that community by also providing space and opportunity to contribute through reading and writing programs, Little Free Libraries, and other community programs.

Opening a new local business presents its fair share of difficulties and unforseen obstacles. But we are confident our experience and passion will allow us to overcome these challenges. Our goal is to be open in the early new year, and every little bit will help us achieve that goal.

Can't contribute here? No problem! Please don't hesitate to share this campaign with anyone and everyone you know. Also, find us on Facebook, like and share. If you'd like to donate in some other way, such as physically helping with renovations or offering discounted or free services, please don't hesitate to get in touch with us!

story:
Short Summary

Zeal Coffee Roasters was established in 2013 with a simple dream of bringing artisan coffee to the small town of Lutz. We started this dream with minimal funding and a small jerry rigged roaster and managed to make an impact on this small but ever growing coffee community. Because of such great support we outgrew our current roaster and the coffee community came together to bless us with a new (to us) 10kg roaster. This new roaster is an exciting addition to our growing business and will allow us to reach further into the community.

Now that we have this new roaster we need your help! We are looking for funding to cover the cost of installing ventilation, propane, and gathering any permits needed to get this up and running. We are also going to use this funding to stock up on our staple coffees, as well as bring in new coffee from farms we will establish direct trade relationships with. The final thing we will use this funding for is to reach out to potential wholesale customers as well as the marketing of our coffee.

Your donation to this campaign is so important to us. We love being able to reach out to the community to fill a need and when the need is met be able to give right back with new coffee and a stronger sense of community.

What We Need & What You Get

$2,500-Installation & Propane

$2,500-Restocking of current coffees

$500-New micro-lot coffee*

$500-Marketing & wholesale

*This micro-lot coffee will be chosen by the community and will only be a limited run available for a short time! This new coffee, Zeal mugs, and a limited edition shirt will all be perks of donating to this campaign.

If we are unable to reach our entire goal of $5,000 we will utilize the funding starting in the order listed above.

Risks & Challenges

We started with very little and have been able to grow and expand our retail shop and obtain new wholesale relationships all with our trusty little roaster and the hard work of our employees.  We know this new season has its own set of challenges, but we have always been able to preserver and reach new heights. We are so excited for all that is to come, risks and challenges included. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate monetarily, don't fret! Sharing with family and friends by word of mouth and social media means just as much to us. Any amount of support from you is greatly appreciated! Be sure to spread the word about our campaign to help us achieve our goal!

Because of such great support we outgrew our current roaster and the coffee community came together to bless us with a new (to us) 10kg roaster. This new roaster is an exciting addition to our growing business and will allow us to reach further into the community.
Now that we have this new roaster we need your help! We are looking for funding to cover the cost of installing ventilation, propane, and gathering any permits needed to get this up and running. We are also going to use this funding to stock up on our staple coffees, as well as bring in new coffee from farms we will establish direct trade relationships with. The final thing we will use this funding for is to reach out to potential wholesale customers as well as the marketing of our coffee.
Your donation to this campaign is so important to us. We love being able to reach out to the community to fill a need and when the need is met be able to give right back with new coffee and a stronger sense of community.   What We Need & What You Get
$2,500-Installation & Propane
$2,500-Restocking of current coffees
$500-New micro-lot coffee*
$500-Marketing & wholesale
*This micro-lot coffee will be chosen by the community and will only be a limited run available for a short time! This new coffee, Zeal mugs, and a limited edition shirt will all be perks of donating to this campaign.
If we are unable to reach our entire goal of $5,000 we will utilize the funding starting in the order listed above.

    Risks & Challenges We started with very little and have been able to grow and expand our retail shop and obtain new wholesale relationships all with our trusty little roaster and the hard work of our employees.  We know this new season has its own set of challenges, but we have always been able to preserver and reach new heights. We are so excited for all that is to come, risks and challenges included. 
    Other Ways You Can Help If you are unable to donate monetarily, don't fret! Sharing with family and friends by word of mouth and social media means just as much to us. Any amount of support from you is greatly appreciated! Be sure to spread the word about our campaign to help us achieve our goal!

story:
What drives us?

USAID states "It is estimated that, in some departments of the country (Haiti), up to 30 percent of children suffer from chronic malnutrition. Although more than 50 percent of Haitians work in agriculture, up to half of Haiti’s food is imported."                  

Agriculture is definitely the answer.  

Having left Haiti at a young age, I returned in 2009 and have been going back. I stayed in my parents home town of Port-a-Piment located in the south of Haiti about 4 and 1/2 hrs from the capitol.  After over 30 yrs of absence, I was shocked to see that time had not been kind to the town.  This was a town full of activity such as commerce, agriculture and livestock.  Signs of poverty was all around, the town had been a victim of a major hurricane which destroyed the pipes bringing in drinking water, then drought (9 months without rain in 2015) and practically no jobs in the private sector.  Farmers no longer tended the land and not much was being grown.  The town of Port-a-Piment serves as host to the largest cave system in the Caribbean.  The lack of economic growth makes it impossible for the inhabitants to take advantage of the tourist activity in the town.  

All this tugged at my heart and I knew that doing nothing was not an option. I needed to get involved to make a difference but knew I would need help.  I decided to embark on this long term project and solicited the help of a few family members and friends.  But now we need your help.

*We are committed to keeping you updated on the project.  


What we have:

  •  We have the land, two acres in town and 12 acres on the outskirts of town have been purchased (I contributed a good portion of my retirement funds for the purchase but now need your help to get the project to come to life) 
  • a small start up fund
  • manpower to work on the land
  •  molds needed to build the dome have been donated to our project 

What we need is your contribution

It will be used to:

  •  enclose and secure the land 
  • dig two wells and purchase materials to set up an irrigation system 
  • purchase tools, seeds, fertilizer for major food crops such as yams, peas, corn and a variety of vegetables.
  •  tilling of the land 
  •  preservation and harvesting of 12 gigantic mango trees already on the land  
  • create jobs that will improve the quality of life of the inhabitants 
  • help educate farmers on various agriculture techniques and provide them with necessary tools to farm land that they either own or lease 
  •  build a geodesic dome nursery to provide start up crops to local and surrounding farmers to encourage a return to agriculture 

Benefits of a Growing Greenhouse Dome

  • domes meet or exceed FEMA’s standards for providing near-absolute protection.  
  • They are proven survivors of tornadoes, hurricanes, earthquakes and fires. 
  • most sufficient in terms of practicality and convenience 
  •  made to produce plants, fresh fruits and vegetables without worrying about the seasons
  • extend fruiting season 
  •  saves on energy because domes are solar powered


The Impact

How will your contribution impact the community?

  •  Improve the quality of life of the people of Port-a-Piment and surrounding areas by providing food and economic security through agriculture.   
  • The addition of the dome greenhouse will promote a new  and secure way to grow plants, vegetables and fruits in an unpredictable climate.
  • The success of this project will serve to encourage others in the private sector to invest in agriculture therefore ensuring economic growth in the southern region.  
  • We are currently very active in the community.  We are members of a non profit organization that is fully involved in the re-development of Port-a-Piment.  Please feel free to visit the organization's website at http://portapiment.com
  • Please fill free to check on our progress after the close of the campaign as we will update periodically with pictures.


Challenge

  • Lack of funding


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • You may not be able to help with a large donation but know people that are looking to fund a trustworthy project....please share, share, share to ensure the success of this project that will make a difference in so many lives.
