story:
Short Summary

My name is Naimah. Many of you know me from my work with Nfinite Productions, which produced arts-based events such as Day ONE, The Art of Ramadan, and Salaam Sunday.  While I truly enjoyed working in the arts, I decided to switch gears and focus on creating an organization that can have an even greater impact on the lives of the people in my community.  In 2014, I  partnered with my husband Khafid to start N Life inc. Since then, we've grown to a team of five members who are dedicated to the preservation and advancement of family and community life. 

In October, we launched our Marriage Mentorship Program entitled #RelationshipGoals. Relationship Goals is a monthly interactive workshop for couples and singles. Each seminar is led by our Marriage Mentors and covers a topic that helps attendees reach common goals, avoid major pitfalls, and build lasting memories. Our goals are to help couples maintain and improve their relationships and to help singles prepare for and enter a new relationship. The purpose of this campaign is to raise the necessary funds to run the program for one year. 

We have secured our mentors, dates, and topics, all we need is a home for our workshops. We've met with community centers and other venues and found that the monthly cost to rent a space is about $200. In addition to the cost of the venue, we would like to pay our mentors $100 per seminar. Our mentors are licensed professionals and seasoned married couples who have agreed to lead workshops in their area of expertise.There are a few other expenses that will need to be covered but we are only asking for the bare minimum to get this program started. We are currently working to receive tax exempt status therefore it is difficult for us to receive grants. This is why we are calling on you to donate. No amount is too small.  We thank you in advance!


What We Need 

We want to keep the mentorship program affordable for participants which is why we need donations to cover our major overhead expenses. 

Our major overhead expenses are: 

  • Venue - $200 per month   Total: 2400
  • Mentors to lead the workshops $100 per month  $1200
If we reach our fundraising goal, we will be able to keep the cost of most of our workshops between 0-$10! Its extremely important to keep the workshops inexpensive. We don't want lack of money to be the reason that a married couple doesn't take steps to save their marriage. 

What You Get

 In addition to the satisfaction you get from knowing that your donations can help save marriages and keep families together, you can receive some awesome perks! 
  • Everyone who donates will receive a personal thank you from a member of the N Life Team
  • Your donation can cover your cost of admission for the workshops! 
  • Your donation can sponsor others to attend!
  • Honorable mention on our social media platforms and websites
All the funds received will go toward the marriage mentorship program.

The Impact

Let's face it, marriage is hard work! Not much value is placed on maintaining happy and healthy marriages these days, but we are working to change that in our communities. If we can provide a consistent source of support and build a network of people that are committed to restoring traditional family life, we can make a tremendous impact. We believe that healthy communities are made up of functional families, and functional families start with healthy marriages/relationships. 

Why a marriage mentorship program? 

Because...

    • we are tired of seeing broken families. 
    • we want to see our single friends in loving happy relationships.
    • we want to see our married friends in loving happy relationships.
    • many couples can't afford or don't think they need counseling, but they still need support
    •  we love seeing couples learning and working together.
    •  we believe we can make a difference. 

Our launch event completely sold out which proves that people want help maintaining their marriages. Please donate to our campaign. If you can not donate, there are many other ways that you can help us reach our goal. 



Who We Are and What We Have Done 

N Life is a non profit organization that identifies and provides beneficial resources, recreational activities, and social events that strengthen and enrich married, family, and community life. Our goal is to provide these resources for free or at an extremely reduced cost for working class families. Since our inception, we've developed strategic partnerships that have allowed us to provide swim classes for children, family fitness walks, financial seminars, and outdoor movie nights, at no cost to our community members!  All of our previous programs have been FREE to the community. In the past, our team has used personal money to fill budget gaps to ensure that our programs could remain free. With our new program, we will need your help!

We are confident that we will reach our goal, but if we don't, the show must go on! We will continue to work to bring Relationship Goals to our community even if it means personally funding the project. If we do not raise all of the funds with this campaign, we will have to charge higher fees to our attendees to fill budget gaps.

We hope to gain your support so that the program is accessible for all who wish to attend.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone might not be in a position to contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Below are ways you can help without spending a dime.

  • Spread the word by sharing this campaign on your social media pages 
  • Ask your friends and family to donate to the cause
  • Volunteer with our organization. We're always looking for people to help organize and man our events and programs
  • In Kind Donations are sometimes even better than money. If you have or know of a venue that would allow us to use the space once a month for free or reeeeally inexpensive please let us know. We can cut our budget in half! 
  • Donate your skills! Are you experienced in graphic design, web design, fundraising, etc? We need you! 
  • Help us promote our organization. Like and Share our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter Page with your networks!
  • Pray for our success! 

.
